Package com.madrobot.text

Text/Date/Time manipulation, extraction and validation utilities.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CharUtils  
    DateFormatUtils
    Date and time formatting utilities and constants.
    DateUtils
    A suite of utilities surrounding the use of the Calendar and Date object.
    DurationFormatUtils
    Duration formatting utilities and constants.
    English
    Convert primitive types like integers to their representation in the English language.
    FastDateFormat
    FastDateFormat is a fast and thread-safe version of SimpleDateFormat.
    LineIterator
    An Iterator over the lines in a Reader.
    RandomString
    Operations for random Strings.
    StopWatch
    StopWatch provides a convenient API for timings.
    StringUtils
    String manipulation utilities
    Validate
    This class assists in validating arguments.
    WordUtils
    Operations on Strings that contain words.
